alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 3:15AM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow is expected to continue above 6500 feet with the greatest accumulation through 5 AM MST this morning. Additional snow accumulation will range from 3 to 8 inches through the rest of the day. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels have dropped to near or just below 7000 feet early this morning and will continue to gradually decline through the day Wednesday. Additional snow forecast through 11 PM Today: Jacob Lake 5 to 8 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
